content:
As some of you already know, I am coordinating an ICT-48 CSA proposal (out of Leiden University) on behalf of CLAIRE. We have already contacted all consortia preparing IC-48 RIA proposals that we know of regarding a mechanism for mutual support that I believe will be highly beneficial to the RIA proposals and to the CSA. Here are the proposals we know about:
TAILOR, CENTRIS, ETERNITIS, HumanE AI Net, TU/e-led proposal (name unknown), AI@Edge, EuFoRIA,
ELLIS-led proposal (name unknown), A3I-NoE.

If you know of any additional RIA proposals, please ask the coordinators to be in contact with me (CC: Alexa Kodde <koddealexa@gmail.com>) ASAP - the deadline for the call is next Wednesday, so time is of the essence.

Thanks! -- Holger

This Tuesday (12.11) SISSA (Triest) is organizing interesting workshop "AI art or science":
https://www.sissa.it/calendar-event/artificial-intelligence-art-or-science
Discussion with director Bertrand Braunschweig of Inria Saclay - Ile de France research centre, coordinating national AI research program is planned at the end.
https://www.inria.fr/en/news/news-from-inria/bertrand-braunschweig-coordinator-inria-of-the-ai-national-programme
I do not know yet if they plan to submit RIA proposal (probably too late if it has not been prepared earlier), but scientifically this is a strong group.
Regards, Wlodek Duch

"If you know of any additional RIA proposals, please ask the coordinators to be in contact with me (CC: Alexa Kodde <koddealexa@gmail.com>) ASAP - the deadline for the call is next Wednesday, so time is of the essence.

Thanks! -- Holger"
